name: Troy_Recliner_Sofa
reviews: Bought this for TV room application and it is very comfortable. Guys delivered it and had it assembled in 15 minutes.
comfortable, well made and highly functional
description:
Relax and enjoy the big game or your favorite movie with friends and family in this comfortable bonded leather sofa. This recliner sofa is an excellent way to relax for years to come.
